<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Path iterator.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is an input iterator that iterates over the individual components in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\a path. The traversal order is as follows:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; The root-name element, if present.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; The root-directory element, if present.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; Each successive filename element, if present.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; Dot, if one or more trailing non-root slash characters are present.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Traversing backwards is possible with \\a reverse&#95;iterator</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Iteration examples. Each component is separated by &#39;,&#39;:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">///   /          =&gt; /</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">///   /foo       =&gt; /,foo</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">///   foo/       =&gt; foo,.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">///   /foo/bar   =&gt; /,foo,bar</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ../        =&gt; ..,.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">///   C:\\foo\\bar =&gt; C:,\\,foo,bar</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @endcode</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/path/const-iterator"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/path/const-iterator">const&#95;iterator</a></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Remove the last component from \\a path unless it is the root dir.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="comment">///   directory/filename.cpp =&gt; directory/</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">///   directory/             =&gt; directory</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="comment">///   filename.cpp           =&gt; &lt;empty&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="comment">///   /                      =&gt; /</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Replace the file extension of \\a path with \\a extension.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ./filename.cpp =&gt; ./filename.extension</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ./filename     =&gt; ./filename.extension</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ./             =&gt; ./.extension</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param path A path that has its extension replaced with \\a extension.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param extension The extension to be added. It may be empty. It may also</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">///                  optionally start with a &#39;.&#39;, if it does not, one will be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">///                  prepended.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Replace matching path prefix with another path.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="comment">///   /foo, /old, /new =&gt; /foo</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="comment">///   /old, /old, /new =&gt; /new</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="comment">///   /old, /old/, /new =&gt; /old</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">///   /old/foo, /old, /new =&gt; /new/foo</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">///   /old/foo, /old/, /new =&gt; /new/foo</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">///   /old/foo, /old/, /new/ =&gt; /new/foo</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">///   /oldfoo, /old, /new =&gt; /oldfoo</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">///   /foo, &lt;empty&gt;, /new =&gt; /new/foo</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">///   /foo, &lt;empty&gt;, new =&gt; new/foo</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">///   /old/foo, /old, &lt;empty&gt; =&gt; /foo</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param Path If \\a Path starts with \\a OldPrefix modify to instead</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="comment">///        start with \\a NewPrefix.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param OldPrefix The path prefix to strip from \\a Path.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param NewPrefix The path prefix to replace \\a NewPrefix with.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param style The style used to match the prefix. Exact match using</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Posix style, case/separator insensitive match for Windows style.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @result true if \\a Path begins with OldPrefix</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#acb31f2db6f0fe5eaa5b28464141223aa">replace&#95;path&#95;prefix</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;char&gt;</a> &amp;Path, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> OldPrefix,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> NewPrefix,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">                         <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Remove redundant leading &quot;./&quot; pieces and consecutive separators.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param path Input path.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @result The cleaned-up \\a path.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a6aa32b6763df05d8187ad5551533b567"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a6aa32b6763df05d8187ad5551533b567">remove&#95;leading&#95;dotslash</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#aac3d0ea99ec07497e1d0fd0cdfc18040">LLVM&#95;LIFETIME&#95;BOUND</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In-place remove any &#39;./&#39; and optionally &#39;../&#39; components from a path.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param path processed path</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param remove&#95;dot&#95;dot specify if &#39;../&#39; (except for leading &quot;../&quot;) should be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">/// removed</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @result True if path was changed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a35c103b5fb70a66a1cb5da3b56f588a1">remove&#95;dots</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;char&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> remove&#95;dot&#95;dot = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Append to path.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @code</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Convert path to the native form. This is used to give paths to users and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="comment">/// operating system calls in the platform&#39;s normal way. For example, on Windows</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="comment">/// all &#39;/&#39; are converted to &#39;\\&#39;. On Unix, it converts all &#39;\\&#39; to &#39;/&#39;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="comment">/// filename != &quot;&quot;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param path Input path.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @result True if the path has a filename, false otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#ad94879f2cf05db817fc49abbe50fbbb1">has&#95;filename</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Has stem?</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="comment">/// stem != &quot;&quot;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param path Input path.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @result True if the path has a stem, false otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#ac4d78a6e97131191378aa1ca03a6c7f5">has&#95;stem</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Has extension?</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="comment">/// extension != &quot;&quot;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param path Input path.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @result True if the path has a extension, false otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a71f8caad22bde933605f9d1634f63288">has&#95;extension</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Is path absolute?</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="comment">/// According to cppreference.com, C++17 states: &quot;An absolute path is a path</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that unambiguously identifies the location of a file without reference to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="comment">/// an additional starting location.&quot;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="comment">/// In other words, the rules are:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1) POSIX style paths with nonempty root directory are absolute.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2) Windows style paths with nonempty root name and root directory are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="comment">///    absolute.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3) No other paths are absolute.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\see has&#95;root&#95;name</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\see has&#95;root&#95;directory</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param path Input path.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @result True if the path is absolute, false if it is not.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#ac35ec1dacb408d4c65d55249c0e02474">is&#95;absolute</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Is path absolute using GNU rules?</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="comment">/// GNU rules are:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1) Paths starting with a path separator are absolute.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2) Windows style paths are also absolute if they start with a character</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="comment">///    followed by &#39;:&#39;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3) No other paths are absolute.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="comment">/// On Windows style the path &quot;C:\\Users\\Default&quot; has &quot;C:&quot; as root name and &quot;\\&quot;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="comment">/// as root directory.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Hence &quot;C:&quot; on Windows is absolute under GNU rules and not absolute under</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="comment">/// C++17 because it has no root directory. Likewise &quot;/&quot; and &quot;\\&quot; on Windows are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="comment">/// absolute under GNU and are not absolute under C++17 due to empty root name.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\see has&#95;root&#95;name</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\see has&#95;root&#95;directory</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param path Input path.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param style The style of \\p path (e.g. Windows or POSIX). &quot;native&quot; style</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="comment">/// means to derive the style from the host.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @result True if the path is absolute following GNU rules, false if it is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="comment">/// not.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a892ec9d16a6daa5ed0965c36fc1caff7">is&#95;absolute&#95;gnu</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Is path relative?</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @param path Input path.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="comment">/// @result True if the path is relative, false if it is not.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a59d172f36ecf079548e9c539ae54e5a4">is&#95;relative</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end namespace path</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end namespace sys</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end namespace llvm</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight></CodeLine>
